--- value_subquery_select_as_value.sql
(SELECT AS VALUE 1)
--- AST
&ast.ScalarSubQuery{
  Rparen: 18,
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select: 1,
    As: &ast.AsValue{
      As: 8,
      Value: 11,
    },
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 17,
          ValueEnd: 18,
          Base: 10,
          Value: "1",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
(SELECT AS VALUE 1)
